Articles.Content: I got this game a year ago. Since then I've built, crashed, and landed rockets an almost all the planets. I love playing the game, and have even gotten my friends on it. I always hope to see new features. The game is so fun and totally addicting. My thanks to the KSP Developmental Team.
Welcome to the forum! 1.0 is sure to be a whole ton of fun... And say "hullo" to your friends from me
Hi Kervelopment! You excited for 1.0? You've certainly joined our forums at an exciting time!
Rightly so! This game is amazing and really deserves praise.
You got your friends on it? How??? All of my friends smacked their noses on the learning wall and quit.
I've been playing daily for 6 months and still find it great...welcome, and sorry about your free time.
Welcome to the forums! I've been Youtube-ing this game for 18 months, now, and I am as excited for a version as I was when 0.23 first introduced "Career" mode (now called Science mode).
